Package tellolib.camera

Class ArucoMarkers

  • java.lang.Object
    • tellolib.camera.ArucoMarkers
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ArucoMarkersInterface
    public class ArucoMarkers
extends java.lang.Object
implements ArucoMarkersInterface
    Convenience functions for OpenCV Aruco Markers feature.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean detectMarkers()
      Perform Aruco marker detection on the current frame held by camera, camera must be streaming.
      boolean detectMarkers​(org.opencv.core.Mat frame)
      Perform Aruco marker detection on the supplied image.
      static ArucoMarkers getInstance()
      Get the global instance of ArucoTracking class.
      java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getMarkerContours()
      Get the contours of detected markers as an array points for each marker from the last call to detectMarkers().
      int getMarkerCount()
      Get the number of markers detected on last call to detectMarkers().
      int getMarkerId​(int index)
      Get the marker id of the selected marker detected by the last call to detectMarkers().
      java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Rect> getMarkerTargets()
      Get detected markers as rectangles located within the image used in last call to detectMarkers() as x,y,h,w.

      • getMarkerId

        public int getMarkerId​(int index)
        Description copied from interface: ArucoMarkersInterface
        Get the marker id of the selected marker detected by the last call to detectMarkers().
        Specified by:
        getMarkerId in interface ArucoMarkersInterface
        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • getMarkerContours

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.MatOfPoint> getMarkerContours()
        Description copied from interface: ArucoMarkersInterface
        Get the contours of detected markers as an array points for each marker from the last call to detectMarkers().
        Specified by:
        getMarkerContours in interface ArucoMarkersInterface
        Returns:
        Array of vectors of 4 corner points for each marker. Null if no markers found.

      • getMarkerTargets

        public java.util.ArrayList<org.opencv.core.Rect> getMarkerTargets()
        Description copied from interface: ArucoMarkersInterface
        Get detected markers as rectangles located within the image used in last call to detectMarkers() as x,y,h,w.
        Specified by:
        getMarkerTargets in interface ArucoMarkersInterface
        Returns:
        List of target rectangles or null if no markers found.
